metadata.description: Modern masters Marv Wolfman and George Perez take the next generation of heroes to the next level! Nightwing, Wonder Girl, Cyborg, Changeling, Jericho, Starfire, and Raven will be challenged like never before as the forces of darkness are aligning against them. This series includes New Teen Titans (1984-1988) + The New Titans (1988-1996).
metadata.name: The New Titans
